Articles.Content:
I have great fun using joystick to control my flying contraptions.

For flying planes, I use standard axis mapping: stick controlling pitch/roll and pedals controlling yaw.

But this configuration is almost useless for rockets, landers and such. To control non-atmospheric crafts, it's much better to control pitch/yaw with the stick. Roll is usually secondary.

Currently I have to exit the game and re-assign axes. It would be awesome if there would be a hotkey swapping roll/yaw axes. It would be even more awesome if this action could be mapped to a joystick button.
Good point. That's the reason why I have only used my joystick for planes so far.
I always thought that should be in the game, since its not I bought a program to do it.
